pages.text: While Asgard Shield: Reloaded (Harken Scythe's sister mod) is detected, new giant swords and shields made from biomass and livingmetal will be added.$(br2)They are made in the same way as other materials, the shields can also be upgraded to their gilded variants.
The items will show more information regarding abilities and weaknesses when you hover your mouse over them on your inventory and hold the $(4)shift$() key.
